sections: §2002.14 - Safeguarding: core protection and handling controls
§2002.15 - Acessing and Disseminating: Covers loawful government purpose, sharing limits etc.
§2002.18 - Decontrolling: Covers removal of CUI status.

restrictions.text: Must be safeguarded from unauthorized access and shared only with authorized personnel who have a lawful government purpose.
Requires access control and proper dissemination markings.
Must not be posted publicly.
No encryption requirement beyond standard organizational policy.

source.document: USDA / DHS Sector-Specific Guidance; 32 CFR Part 2002 (applied)
sections: Food and Agriculture Sector Critical Infrastructure Guidance

restrictions.text: Information revealing vulnerabilities in agricultural production, processing, storage, or distribution systems must be restricted to authorized personnel.
Information that could enable intentional contamination of crops, livestock, or food supply chains must not be publicly released.
Operational or response procedures related to agricultural biosecurity incidents must be limited to personnel with a lawful government purpose.
Detailed storage locations, quantities, or facility layouts involving ammonium nitrate must be restricted.
Transportation routes or transfer procedures for ammonium nitrate must not be publicly disclosed.
Supply chain or vendor information involving ammonium nitrate distribution must be limited to authorized personnel.

source.document: Agricultural Chemical Safety and Security Guidance

restrictions.text: Technical details regarding bulk agricultural chemical storage or handling must be restricted.
Information describing chemical formulations, concentrations, or application methods must be limited to authorized personnel.
Distribution or logistics data involving large-scale agricultural chemicals must not be publicly released.

source.document: Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA); EPA Pesticide Programs

restrictions.text: Information detailing pesticide toxicity thresholds or lethal concentrations must be restricted.
Facility-specific pesticide storage or application data must not be publicly disclosed.
Inspection findings or regulatory enforcement actions involving pesticide misuse must be limited to authorized personnel.

source.document: DHS Critical Infrastructure Security Guidance; 32 CFR Part 2002 (applied)

restrictions.text: Information identifying vulnerabilities in critical infrastructure systems, facilities, or networks must be restricted to authorized personnel.
Facility-specific infrastructure layouts, schematics, or operational configurations must not be publicly disclosed.
Information that could enable disruption of essential services or infrastructure operations must be limited to personnel with a lawful government purpose.
Interdependency data describing relationships between critical infrastructure sectors must not be publicly released.
Emergency response procedures and infrastructure recovery plans must be restricted to authorized operational personnel.

source.document: Naval Nuclear Propulsion Information Controls; Atomic Energy Act Authorities (applied)
sections: Naval Nuclear Propulsion Information Handling Requirements

restrictions.text: Technical information concerning naval nuclear propulsion plant design, operation, or performance must be restricted to authorized personnel.
Reactor plant schematics, component configurations, or propulsion system layouts must not be publicly disclosed.
Access to naval nuclear propulsion information must be limited to individuals with a validated need to support authorized naval reactor programs.
Information describing propulsion endurance, fuel lifecycle, or operational capabilities must be restricted.
Maintenance, refueling, or reactor servicing procedures must be limited to authorized technical personnel.

source.document: DoDI 5200.48 Controlled Unclassified Information; DoD Controlled Technical Information Guidance
sections: Controlled Technical Information Marking and Dissemination
Distribution Statements and Export Control Alignment

restrictions.text: Technical data revealing military system design, performance, or operational capabilities must be restricted to authorized personnel.
Engineering drawings, schematics, or manufacturing process documentation must not be publicly disclosed.
Access to controlled technical information must be limited to individuals supporting authorized defense programs or contracts.
Distribution of controlled technical information must comply with applicable export control and distribution statement requirements.
Technical data that could enable replication, modification, or exploitation of defense systems must be restricted.
